name: Balsamic Roasted Pork Loin
author: Melissa S.
summary: A zesty, yet simple meal with an olive oil and balsamic vinegar marinade. A crowd pleaser!
directions: Dissolve steak seasoning in balsamic vinegar, then stir in olive oil
Place pork into a resealable plastic bag and pour marinade overtop
Squeeze out air and seal bag; marinate 2 hours to overnight
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place pork into a glass baking dish along with marinade
Bake in preheated oven, basting occasionally until the pork reaches an internal temperature of 145 degrees F (65 degrees C), about 1 hour
Let the roast rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving
